query.q: SERIES_SUM("M::`kubernetes`:(AVG(`pod`) AS `Number of Container`) { `cluster_name_k8s` = '#{cluster_name}' and `namespace` = '#{namespace}' } BY `namespace`, `cluster_name_k8s`")
O::`kubernetes_nodes`:(AVG(`age`) AS `Length of Running Time`) { `cluster_name_k8s` = '#{cluster_name}' } BY `node_name`
O::`kubelet_pod`:(AVG(`age`) AS `Length of Running Time`) { `cluster_name_k8s` = '#{cluster_name}' and `namespace` = '#{namespace}' } BY `pod_name`
O::`kubernetes_services`:(AVG(`age`) AS `Length of Running Time`) { `cluster_name_k8s` = '#{cluster_name}' and `namespace` = '#{namespace}' } BY `namespace`, `service_name`
O::`kubernetes_replica_sets`:(AVG(`age`) AS `Length of Running Time`) { `cluster_name_k8s` = '#{cluster_name}' and `namespace` = '#{namespace}' } BY `deployment`, `replica_set_name`
O::`kubernetes_cluster_roles`:(AVG(`age`) AS `Length of Running Time`) BY `cluster_name_k8s`, `namespace`
M::`disk`:(AVG(`total`) AS `Total Disk Space`) { `cluster_name_k8s` = '#{cluster_name}'  and `cluster_name_k8s` != ''} BY `device`, `host`
M::`disk`:(AVG(`used`) AS `Used Disk Space`) { `cluster_name_k8s` = '#{cluster_name}'  and `cluster_name_k8s` != ''} BY `device`, `host`
M::`disk`:(AVG(`free`) AS `Free Disk Space`) { `cluster_name_k8s` = '#{cluster_name}'  and `cluster_name_k8s` != ''} BY `device`, `host`

units.key: Number of pods in current space
units.name: Number of pods in current space

charts.name: Distribution of pods in cluster space

query.alias: Number of pods in current space
query.q: M::`kubernetes`:(AVG(`pod`) AS `Number of pods in current space`) { `cluster_name_k8s` = '#{cluster_name}' } BY `namespace`
